scripts.start: npm run k1 & npm run k2 & npm run k3 & npm run k4 & npm run k5 & npm run k6 & npm run k7
scripts.k1: cd k1 && PORT=8081 npm run dev
scripts.k2: cd k2 && PORT=8082 npm run dev
scripts.k3: cd k3 && PORT=8083 npm run dev
scripts.k4: cd k4 && PORT=8084 npm run dev
scripts.k5: cd k5 && PORT=8085 npm run dev
scripts.k6: cd k6 && PORT=8086 npm run dev
scripts.k7: cd k7 && PORT=8087 npm run dev
